descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, armor or otherwise. Its based on the classic sling bikini look.
It comes in both red and black color variants and can be found inside the Whiterun blacksmith (Warmaidens), next to the counter. 

Armors are additional content and WILL NOT REPLACE anything already existing in the game.
Armors are for the UNP body. I used BBP too, when I made the mod and it seems it is required (according to feedback). 
Armors should work on all weights.
Armors use the Daedric mesh, when they are dropped on the ground etc.

Installation should just be a matter of dropping the mods Data folder into your existing Skyrim Data file and making sure the mod is \"ticked\" (on the Data files list) when you go to start the game.
author: cyric79
